verses.name: Malachi 3:7
verses.text: Even from the days of your fathers ye are gone away from mine ordinances, and have not kept them. Return unto me, and I will return unto you, saith the Lord of hosts. But ye said, Wherein shall we return?

verses.name: Malachi 3:8
verses.text: Will a man rob God? Yet ye have robbed me. But ye say, Wherein have we robbed thee? In tithes and offerings.

verses.name: Malachi 3:9
verses.text: Ye are cursed with a curse: for ye have robbed me, even this whole nation.
